property.name: Move existing fighters to new carriers
notes
property.value:
============================================

- BATTLE OF AVENTURICA -

<
Designed by Nick Taylor
============================================

The dark wizard and demon master BORBARAD
was defeated years ago and has been sent
to the limbo.

Now some of his followers fetched him back
during a magic ritual.

Again he tries to conquer Aventuria and
this time he is supported by Orcs and
Al Anfa a country in the deep south.

===================GOALS====================

Capture 5 of the 8 captial countries
or kill 3 of the 5 opponent leaders

================TURN ORDER=================

Imperial - Orcs - Thorwal - Borbarad - Al Anfa

===================UNITS====================

--------------Attack/Defend/Movement/Cost/Ability-------------


----------------------------Land Units----------------------------

OrcDefense - 0 / 2 / 0 / 1 Cannot move
GoblinInfantry - 1 / 1 / 1 / 2 Supported by catapult
SkeletonInfantry - 1 / 1 / 1 / 2 Supported by catapult
OrcInfantry - 1 / 2 / 1 / 3 Supported by catapult
SpearInfantry - 1 / 2 / 1 / 3 Supported by catapult
ThorwalInfantry - 1 / 3 / 1 / 3 Supported by catapult
KnightInfantry - 2 / 2 / 1 / 4 Supported by catapult
OgreInfantry - 3 / 3 / 1 / 6 Supported by catapult
Catapult - 2 / 1 / 1 / 4 Artillery
LightCavalry - 3 / 2 / 2 / 5 Blitz
HeavyCavalry - 4 / 3 / 2 / 8 Blitz
Wizard - 0 / 1 / 1 / 5 AAA
Castle - 0 / 1 / 0 / 20 Factory + AAA
Leader/Hero - 5 / 5 / 1 / - No transport costs

-----------------------------Air Units-----------------------------

Heshthot - 3 / 2 / 4 / 8 Fighter
Demon - 4 / 3 / 4 / 12 Fighter
Dragon - 4 / 2 / 5 / - Bomber
GiantDragon - 5 / 3 / 6 / 18 Bomber

-----------------------------Sea Units-----------------------------

Raft - 0 / 0 / 1 / 5 Capacity: 2
Caravel - 0 / 1 / 2 / 8 Capacity: 4
Galleon - 2 / 1 / 2 / 10 Capacity: 5
Otta - 3 / 2 / 3 / 12 Capacity: 5
Clipper - 3 / 3 / 3 / 15 Bombard - 2 hits
Demonship - 1 / 4 / 2 / 18 Carrier - Capacity: 3

---------------------------Neutral Units---------------------------

Sun in the Desert - 0 / 1 / - / -
DwarfInfantry - 3 / 3 / - / -
AchazInfantry - 3 / 3 / - / -
ElveInfantry - 3 / 3 / - / -
CamelCavalry - 2 / 3 / - / -
TrollInfantry - 4 / 4 / - / -
CyclopeInfantry - 5 / 5 / - / -

============================================
